## Vault.adjust() method

Calculate the result of an [adjustVault()](./lib-base.transactablemoneyp.adjustvault.md) transaction on this Vault.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
adjust(params: VaultAdjustmentParams<Decimalish>, borrowingRate?: Decimalish): Vault;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | [VaultAdjustmentParams](./lib-base.vaultadjustmentparams.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Parameters of the transaction. |
|  borrowingRate | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Borrowing rate to use when adding to the Vault's debt. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Vault](./lib-base.vault.md)
